item.title: Miracle-pum add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Miracle-pum add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Miracle-pum add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "We are taught you must blame your father, your sisters, your brothers, the school, the teachers - but never blame yourself. It's never your fault. But it's always your fault, because if you wanted to change you're the one who has got to change." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Miracle-pum add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself." -- Andy Warhol

item.title: Miracle-pum add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Miracle-pum add a quote by Madonna
item.description: "No matter who you are, no matter what you did, no matter where you've come from, you can always change, become a better version of yourself." -- Madonna

item.title: Miracle-pum add a quote by Coco Chanel
item.description: "Fashion changes, but style endures." -- Coco Chanel

item.title: Miracle-pum add a quote by Wayne W. Dyer
item.description: "Change the way you look at things and the things you look at change." -- Wayne W. Dyer

item.title: Miracle-pum add a quote by Patricia Briggs
item.description: "A man says a lot of things in summer he doesn't mean in winter." -- Patricia Briggs

item.title: Miracle-pum add a quote by Socrates
item.description: "Let him who would move the world first move himself." -- Socrates

item.title: Miracle-pum add a quote by Jack Johnson
item.description: "But you're so busy changing the world Just one smile can change all of mine" -- Jack Johnson

item.title: Miracle-pum add a quote by Seth Godin
item.description: "Change almost never fails because it's too early. It almost always fails because it's too late." -- Seth Godin

item.title: Miracle-pum add a quote by Karl Lagerfeld
item.description: "I am a fashion person, and fashion is not only about clothes -- it's about all kinds of change" -- Karl Lagerfeld
